nodes.text: The sacred orbs were a set of three spherical energy sources supposedly created by the Architects. The three orbs—the Breeze Globe, Rain Globe, and Solstice Globe—kept the planet Livno III habitable. After a war broke out on Livno III, the orbs were lost, but two were eventually recovered. The Solstice Globe was found by the Lynna Zel Gris on Hynestia, and eventually returned to its planet of origin.
